roleset.name: to free from impurities, purify
roleset.note: PURGE-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of Vncls cheat-10.6, wipe_manner-10.4.1. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from purge.01-v)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: [China 's Communist leadership]-1 voted [*-1]to purge the party of `` hostile and anti-party elements '' and wealthy private businessmen , whom they called [*T*-2] exploiters .
example.arg: of `` hostile and anti-party elements '' and wealthy private businessmen , whom they called [*T*-2] exploiters
